apps.description:
Key can be user model id, filename or a full path.
 In case of path this should be an executable or a lnk file, otherwise use `files`.

 Value is the path to the icon relative to the icon pack folder.

files.description:
Intended to store file icons by extension

 Key is the extension, value is the relative path to the icon

missing.description: Special icon used when some other icon is not found

specific.description:
Here specific icons for widgets can be stored.
 we recomend following the widget id + icon name to avoid collisions
 e.g. "@username/widgetid::iconname" but you can use whatever you want

anyOf.description: Value is the path to the icon relative to the icon pack folder.

dark.description:
Icon to use when system theme is dark\
 Value is the path to the icon relative to the icon pack folder.

light.description:
Icon to use when system theme is light\
 Value is the path to the icon relative to the icon pack folder.

mask.description:
Mask to be applied over the icon, themes can use this to apply custom colors over the icon.\
 Set it to `null` to disable masking. \
 Value is the path to the icon relative to the icon pack folder.

ResourceId.description: visual id composed of the creator username and the resource name

description.description: Map of language code to description. Could be a string, mapped to `en`.

appTargetVersion.description:
App target version that this resource is compatible with.\
 Developers are responsible to update the resource so when resource does not
 match the current app version, the resource will be shown with a warning message

banner.description: Banner image with aspect ratio of 21/9, this is used when promoting the resource.

displayName.description: Map of language code to display name. Could be a string, mapped to `en`.

portrait.description: Portrait image with aspect ratio of 1/1

screenshots.description: Screenshots should use aspect ratio of 16/9

tags.description: tags are keywords to be used for searching and indexing

ResourceText.description: Map of language code as key an translated values. Could be a string, mapped to `en`.
